title: Excellent air fryer!
text:
I’ve been using this air fryer for a while and overall I’m very happy with it. The glass bowls feel much safer than traditional non-stick baskets and they’re easy to clean. Food comes out crispy on the outside and juicy inside, especially wings and fries.
The capacity is great for family meals. The only downsides are that it takes up some counter space and the glass gets very hot, so you need oven mitts. It’s a bit pricey, but the quality and performance make it worth it.
author: HongChen

title: Ninja's best air fryer yet!
text:
I've been a fan of Ninja's kitchen products since the original Foodi and this Crispi Pro is their best air fryer to date.

The glass containers make preparation and cleanup a snap, and the different sized containers included allow for a wide range of cooking, from full roasted chickens to a single serving of pizza rolls.

I have used this every day since it became a part of my kitchen and can't imagine going back to a traditional air fryer!

title: Doesn’t live up to the hype
text: It definitely doesnt roast well. Chicken was still half raw after using the instructed time/temp. Air frying isnt any better than using my oven - actually, the oven is better.
author: MegMick
brandResponses:
[{'name': 'SharkNinja Product Expert', 'responseHtml': '\nHi there,
Thank you for your feedback on the AS101CY Ninja - Crispi Pro 6-in-1 Countertop Glass Air Fryer. We understand how important it is for your meals to cook thoroughly and consistently, and we’ll absolutely share your comments with the relevant teams for consideration on future products. We hope you’ll give our products another try in the future.
